short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly rephrase, check grammar, translate, explain, summarise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One-click interface to rephrase, translate, summarize, and check the grammar of the text selected on a page. Simply select the text, click on the SpeedProof extension icon, and choose your preferred action to modify it using ChatGPT.

✅ Check Grammar
📄 Summarize
🌐 Translate
🔄 Rephrase in Any Tone of Voice
❓ Get an Answer
❗ Get an Explanation of the Term

Support: mshamrock@gmail.com

1.4 Version Updates:
- Remembers last choice in language and rephrase selection.

1.3 Version Updates:
- New languages: Chinese (Traditional), Chinese (Simplified)
- Clear button
- Upload the latest result in case you accidentally close the window
- New tone: Rephrase with an academic tone of voice.
